page.title: 15CHURCHES ON ST.MARY'S
page.content: ST.MARY'CHURCHES We have 4 churches on St Mary's.A Parish,a Methodist,a Catholic, and a small one at Old Town.We have several stained glass windows,one is of St Francis and lots of animals and another of St Michael.There is an organ in the Parish church and an organ in the Methodist.There is a piano in the Parish and Methodist and there is a pedal organ in Old Town. There are 3 vicars on St Mary's which travel to the off islands.There are Sunday schools in the Parish and Methodist on Sunday morning.The Methodist was was built in 1898 and the Parish in 1838. The vicar of the parish lives in the Chaplaincy and the vicar of the Methodist lives in a house opposite the church.The Catholic church seats 35 and has a garden at the back .
